segments.text: So Emily , do you still want to see a movie together this weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , what do you want to see ? I don't think there are many good movies out right now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mmmm ... I know ! We can go to a really bad sci-fi movie and sit in the back of the theater and make fun of it . What do you think ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now that's a great plan . It's a date !
segments.speaker: S2
